mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT(EVENT_NO, EVENT_TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_TYPE, EVENT_STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_ENO.NEXTVAL, #{eventTitle}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{eventContent}, #{eventType}, #{eventStatus})

INSERT INTO EVENT_ATTACHMENT(EVENT_FILE_NO, REF_ENO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_EFNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_ENO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, #{fileLevel})
